ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellina returns for an epic battle to determine who rules Hell! This time she is joined by her recently-deposed sovereign and lover, SCYTHE. Combined, they have the power to slay armies of their foes. But while Hellina may be Hell's Adjudicator, can even she stop the undefeated Hell's Assassin? The awe-inspiring art of Gabriel Andrade is on every issue of this series, joined by writer Pat Shand, as they unleash the forces of evil for a rumble down under!
Available with a host of sexy stunning covers with this issue including a Regular & Wraparound Covers by series artist Gabriel Andrade, Bad Girl Cover by Christian Zanier, Enforcer Cover by Ron Adrian, Sacrilege Cover by Raulo Caceres, and Stunning Cover by Matt Martin. Plus an array of super limited covers for the collector including a Fetish Fashion Set (of 3 books limited to 250) and a Nude & Naughty Set (of 3 books limited to 350), by Christian Zanier, as well as an incredible Leather Cover by Di Amorim. And for the erotic art collectors, there is the Wraparound Nude by Andrade, Bad Girl Nude by Zanier, Enforcer Nude by Adrian, Sacrilege Nude by Caceres, and Stunning Nude by Martin. For the best in extreme erotic art we also have a Century Adult Cover (limited to 100 copies) by Juan Jose Ryp, Stunning Adult Cover by Martin, and Adult & Adult Extreme Covers by Zanier.
